# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)third[-_]?party/
(?:^|/)3rdparty/

(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$
(?:^|/)vendor/

\.mo$

^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qtest-zone-data/DNSSEC-TP/dnssec03/dnssec03.cfg\E$
^\Qtest-zone-data/DNSSEC-TP/dnssec16/cds-invalid-rrsig.cfg\E$
^\Qtest-zone-data/DNSSEC-TP/dnssec16/cds-matches-no-dnskey.cfg\E$
^\Qtest-zone-data/DNSSEC-TP/dnssec16/cds-matches-non-sep-dnskey.cfg\E$
^\Qtest-zone-data/DNSSEC-TP/dnssec16/cds-matches-non-zone-dnskey.cfg\E$
